title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not returning expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the code on Tomcat 7.0.0, the output is "MySomeAnn". However, I expected the output to be "MySomeClass". This is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: The expected behavior is that the output should be "MySomeClass".
